name: amberpad
description: A note's manager app with the visuals of a Webchat

scripts.build:prebuild: rimraf ./.package && npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:darwin: npm run build:prebuild && npm run build:icons:darwin && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --projectDir ./.package --mac
scripts.build:win32: npm run build:prebuild && npm run build:icons:win32 && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --projectDir ./.package --win
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:prebuild && npm run build:icons:linux && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --projectDir ./.package --linux
scripts.publish:darwin: npm run build:prebuild && npm run build:icons:darwin && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --projectDir ./.package --mac -p "onTagOrDraft"
scripts.publish:win32: npm run build:prebuild && npm run build:icons:win32 && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --projectDir ./.package --win -p "onTagOrDraft"
scripts.publish:linux: npm run build:prebuild && npm run build:icons:linux && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --projectDir ./.package --linux -p "onTagOrDraft"
scripts.start: cross-env AMBERPAD_ENVIRONMENT=development npm run build:prebuild && concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:electron" "babel-node -- renderer.esbuild.mjs --watch"
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:start
